multiplechoiceresponse.p: You are creating a new user but the password (Password) keeps throwing an error. What is likely the problem?

choicegroup.choice: You have to create the user before assigning the password.
The password does not meet complexity requirements.
You do not have permission to create a user.
The user already has a password.

div.p: The password does not meet complexity requirements. Even when you are creating a new user where the password will be changed, the password must meet complexity requirements.
